languages.text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt when this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text:
[draft] The owner of this hammer knocks their targets back, making them loose {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to the amount of cells they spent (to a maximum of 3) on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Maces and hammers have a special attack that pushes enemies away.
+10% stacking chance to Stun an enemy for one turn for each point of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g}. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} negates this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
All damage dealt when this weapon pushes an enemy is increased by +100%.
